title: The X jewel,
author: Moncreiff, Fred. Chas.
snippet: Again, by making a detour to the south, I might ride as far as Strathmiglo, and, turning then at right angles, reach Perth by the Pass of Dron.

title: Open the door,
author: Carswell, Catherine MacFarlane
snippet: Lawrence was also to see them now for the first time. . . . Cupar, Falkland, Auchtermuchty, Strathmiglo! . . . such promising names as they had! Did Joanna know any of them?

title: Scotland Picturesque and Traditional. A pilgrimage with staff and knapsack
author: Todd, George Eyre.
snippet: Nothing is left of the ancient forest of Falkland except somenatural wooding at Drumdreel, near Strathmiglo, the oaks having beenruthlessly cut down by Cromwell to build fortifications at Dundee.
